description:
This full face mask is a great choice for kids, allowing them to breathe naturally with both nose and mouth, and giving them a 180-degree view of the big blue. Great for surface-oriented snorkelling.

  • Full face style allows natural breathing through the nose and mouth
  • 180° super-wide angle lens provides panoramic viewing area
  • Moulded silicone construction forms a comfortable seal with your skin
  • Anti-fog system creates a separate breathing chamber to channel airflow away from your eyes
  • Dry snorkel prevents water from getting into your mouth
  • Adjustable elastic head strap keeps the mask firmly in place as you splash and swim
  • Mask will not allow you to equalize. Recommended for surface use only
  • One size fits all. Made to fit children as young as 4 years old
name: Fathom Bahama Full Face Mask - Youths
